item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I am Vivek. I am a developer based out of Kerala, India. Addicted to computers from a young age, I have been developing small micro-controller based programs to complex enterprise applications for some time now. I see technology as an “enabler” & is marvelled by the progress, we as a species, able to achieve using it. I co-founded Codeister Technologies, during my college days. Our product was an automated expense manager app called SYM (Save Your Money).
